text: wasanawakata kappetipola, wira puran appu, anagarika dharmapala wani wirawarayin ape jana hadawath thulin thawa ma gilihi natha.
anathma- ee siyalu de wala anithya ha dukkha swabhawaya katawath wenas karanna, wasanga karanna ba kiyana eka.(
sabiwinma dakagatha haki wuye, binda watima da eeta palawu pa්rathicharaya da pasugiya dashaka thuna thisse mulya kunatu gananawakata thudu dun kriyawalinge kshanika aarambhaya wu bawayi.

mema sancharayedi japana niyojya agamathi saha mudal amathya taro aso, jathika aarakshawa pilibanda amathya saha amathya mandala pradhana lekam yoshadi suga, japanaye widesha katayuthu wadabalana amathya sunichi, susuki, idam yatithala pahasukam prawahana saha sancharaka amathya akihiro ota, abhyanthara katayuthu saha sanniwedana amathya yoshitaka shindo, mulya katayuthu pilibanda jyeshta upa amathya yuko ubachi, aarthika welenda saha karmantha pilibanda niyojya amathya masaki tayira, japan jathyanthara sahayogitha aayathanaye sabhapathi akihiko tanaka, libaral prajathranthawadi pakshaye upa sabhapathi saha hitapu widesha amathya masiko komura, japana widesha wyaparika sammelanaye sabhapathi hiroyuki ishige, shri lankawe samaya, nawatha padinchikirima pilibanda japana niyojitha yashushi akashi yana mahathma mahathmin hamuwu amathya basil rajapaksha mahatha derata athara anagatha welenda saha aarthika sanwardhana katayuthu sahayogithawaya wadidiyunu karaganima saha derata athara aarthika katayuthu prawardhanaya pilibandawada sakachcha karana ladi.

mita amatharawa adhiwegi margaye athulu anek siyalu margawala dhawanaya wana bas rathawala gaman wara wadi kara athi athara, dinakata gaman wara dekak pamanak dhawanaya kala bas rathawala gaman wara 3k ho 4k dakwa wadi kara athayida amathiwaraya kiya. 15 da dakwa pitakotuwa, kadawatha, katunayaka, piliyandala, makumbaura, panadura sita galla saha mathara dakwa bas ratha dhawanaya kerenu atha. 16 sita 21 dakwa galla ha mathara sita ema pradesha kara aapasu paminena bas rathada yodawa athayi amathi waraya kiya.
